header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Strictness and parenting, bed times, messaging online, having a phone as a child, tidying bedrooms, step daughters, friendâ€™s clever (autistic) child, ice cream (brown devil), nut allergies, desserts, numbers, exams, summer holidays, irish education system
header.activity: Chat about parenting then dinner table conversation

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
